column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I'm never sure what to expect at an art museum
column2: and especially when tickets are expensive I get wary. However
column3: the Art Institute of Chicago truly has something for everyone. The miniatures were incredible
column4: the architecture and furniture displays fascinating
column5: the modern art was equally confounding and cool
column6: and there's a ton of European Renaissance art for people who just want to see paintings of saints. You could easily spend a day here.
